snippet: A 10-man Roma scored a late equalizer to salvage a 1-1 draw with Juventus and keep alive its faint Serie A title hopes.
abstract: Roma ties Juventus, 1-1, in Serie A play; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: A 10-man Roma scored a late equalizer to salvage a 1-1 draw with Juventus and keep alive its faint Serie A title hopes.

headline.main: Roma Remains Alive in Serie A
headline.print_headline: Roma Remains Alive in Serie A
